TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Satefo, title = Satefo, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satefo} }

S.FORM: == Satefo == u sulit nu Hulam 下德武部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Satefo. u kasalumaluma' nu Satefo sa, 63 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 148 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 136 ku tademaw, pakalatu 92%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 12 ku tademaw, pakalatu 8%. u sausi nu cidekay a tademaw u Pangcah a niyazu' u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 81%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, Sakizaya 1%, zumazuma 8%. u pangca sa, u cidekay nu Taywan Incumin. tusa a bataan a mang ku tademaw. mueneng i Kalinku i Pusung atu i dadipasan nu bayu'an. satuuday a cidekay u Pangcah. u Sakizaya a tademaw izaw tu ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabulaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiluc tu tina niyazu'. nasulitan ni Liaw Socen. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin:

== Satefo == o solit no Holam 下德武部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Satefo. o kasalomaloma' no Satefo sa, 63 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 148 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 136 ko tademaw, pakalato 92%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 12 ko tademaw, pakalato 8%. o saosi no cidekay a tademaw o Pangcah a niyazo' o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 81%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, Sakizaya 1%, zomazoma 8%. o pangca sa, o cidekay no Taywan Incomin. tosa a bataan a mang ko tademaw. moeneng i Kalinko i Posong ato i dadipasan no bayo'an. satooday a cidekay o Pangcah. o Sakizaya a tademaw izaw to ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabolaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiloc to tina niyazo'. nasolitan ni Liaw Socen. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin:
